references.paper_title: Adam: A Method for Stochastic Optimization
references.reason: This paper introduced the Adam optimizer, a widely used algorithm for training deep learning models, crucial for the diffusion models used in this research.

references.paper_title: Learning to Generate Images from Text
references.reason: This paper introduced a text-to-image generation approach using transformers, a foundational model for the type of image generation covered by this research.
This paper introduced denoising diffusion probabilistic models (DDPMs), the underlying model class used in the research presented in this paper.
This paper presented improvements to the DDPMs, including the techniques used in the current research.

references.paper_title: Elucidating the Design Space of Diffusion-Based Generative Models
references.reason: This paper provides a comprehensive analysis of various aspects of diffusion models, highly relevant to the current research.
